documentation.text:
This is the MeroEthCvx strategy, which is designed to be used by a Mero ETH Vault.
 The strategy holds ETH as it's underlying and allocates liquidity to Convex via given Curve Pool with 2 underlying tokens.
 Rewards received on Convex (CVX, CRV), are sold in part for the underlying.
 A share of earned CVX & CRV are retained on behalf of the Mero community to participate in governance.

addRewardToken(address).details: These are tokens that are not the main assets of the strategy. For instance, temporary incentives.
addRewardToken(address).notice: Add a reward token to list of extra reward tokens.

params.token_: Address of token to add to reward token list.

balance().notice: Get the total underlying balance of the strategy.

deposit().notice: Deposit all available underlying into Convex pool.

harvest().details: Any underlying harvested is not redeposited by this method.
harvest().notice: Harvests reward tokens and sells these for the underlying.

harvestable().details: Includes rewards for CRV, CVX & Extra Rewards.
harvestable().notice: Amount of rewards that can be harvested in the underlying.

returns._0: Estimated amount of underlying available to harvest.

name().notice: Returns the name of the strategy.

params.token_: Address of token to remove from reward token list.

rewardTokens().notice: Returns the list of reward tokens supported by the strategy.

returns._0: The list of reward tokens supported by the strategy.

setCommunityReserve(address).details: CRV & CVX will be taxed and allocated to the reserve,      such that Mero can participate in governance.
setCommunityReserve(address).notice: Set the address of the community reserve.

setCrvCommunityReserveShare(uint256).notice: Set the share of CRV to send to the Community Reserve.

params.crvCommunityReserveShare_: New fee charged on CRV rewards for governance.

setCvxCommunityReserveShare(uint256).notice: Set the share of CVX to send to the Community Reserve.

params.cvxCommunityReserveShare_: New fee charged on CVX rewards for governance.

setImbalanceToleranceIn(uint256).details: Stored as a percent, e.g. 1% would be set as 0.01
setImbalanceToleranceIn(uint256).notice: Set imbalance tolerance for Curve Pool deposits.

setImbalanceToleranceOut(uint256).details: Stored as a percent, e.g. 1% would be set as 0.01
setImbalanceToleranceOut(uint256).notice: Set imbalance tolerance for Curve Pool withdrawals.

setStrategist(address).details: Can only be set by current strategist.

shutdown().notice: Shuts down the strategy, disabling deposits.

strategist().notice: Returns the address of the strategist.

returns._0: The the address of the strategist.

withdraw(uint256).details: This can only be called by the vault.      If the amount is not available, it will be made liquid.
withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw an amount of underlying to the vault.

withdrawAll().details: This does not liquidate reward tokens and only considers      idle underlying, idle lp tokens and staked lp tokens.

The strategy holds ETH as it's underlying and allocates liquidity to Convex via given Curve Pool with 2 underlying tokens. Rewards received on Convex (CVX, CRV), are sold in part for the underlying. A share of earned CVX & CRV are retained on behalf of the Mero community to participate in governance.
